flawed_nl_solution:
Caleb was left with 40 - 3 - 3 - 5 - 2 = <<40-3-3-5-2=72>>72 dandelion puffs to give to his friends.
They each received 72/3 = <<72/3=24>>24 dandelion puffs
#### 24

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
